summary: A bored wealthy housewife on the verge of insanity cuts loose with some lively Yugoslavian immigrants who delight in their bohemian lifestyle.
cast: Susan Anspach|Erland Josephson|Marianne Jacobi|Jamie Marsh|John Zacharias|Per Oscarsson|Marina Lindahl|Bora Todorovic|Lisbeth Zachrisson|Svetozar Cvetkovic|Patricia Gélin|Dragan Ilic|Nikola Janic|Mile Petrovic|John Parkinson|Jan Nygren|Lasse Åberg|Kaarina Harvistola|Eva Gislén|Elsie Hohn|Paul Smith|Bo-Ivan Petersson
title: Montenegro
